website_summaries.verdict: Apple’s smallest tablet is no slouch, and it delivers the speed, quality, and flexibility the company’s known for, all in a smaller package. If you’re looking for the most powerful 7-inch tablet around, this is it.
pros: It’s got the A12 CPU on board - the same chip used in larger iPads
Both front and back cameras take incredible photos
It’s fast and light, and it comes in multiple colors
cons: It’s much more expensive than other 7-inch tablets
It uses Lightning cables instead of USB-C. Like all iPads, there’s no way to expand the local file storage

customer_reviews.title: It's the latest iPad mini, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I was waiting for. I was (am) an owner of the original gen1 iPad Mini, which I loved. However, it has become too slow for most use cases and is 2 iOS revs back, so I had to upgrade. I was holding out for an update, not wanting to purchase the Mini-4 which is already 2+ years old. The Mini-5 is very fast, responsive and the perfect size for how I use an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Just another Music/Web/Technology Lover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Small tablet
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an ipad mini 2 and the performance difference is amazing! Much faster. Love the screen, very clear and setup was a snap. Best and most powerful small tablet on the market and runs all aps quickly and smoothly. Very small and light, easy to hold in one hand. Battery life is simply stunning at about 10 hours. Can't recommend highly enough for those looking for a smaller tablet. Great for reading books from as it the size of a book.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great portability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my original iPad mini (2013), could not be happier. Excellent screen, quick processor, and smooth OS. Chose this over the pro simply because I wanted something portable in between my iPhone 7 Plus and MacBook Pro. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Apple to continue the iPad Mini Series! It is the Perfect Tablet for many of us!
customer_reviews.text: I owned an iPad Mini 2 since 2014, but that is getting slow year by year. I wanted a faster tablet with the same size and the Apple finally decided to continue the mini line, so could replace it. I hope it will serve me well for the next 3-5 years. Thanks Apple, and please keep supporting the mini line for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lukacs

customer_reviews.title: Used.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised when I started to login to see two other Apple ids attached to this iPad. Unable to remove the ids I now get constant reminders for them to login. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Pixel bad in screen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this iPad to upgrade our existing iPad. The day I received it, I turned it on to set it up & there was a pixel bad in the screen. It was a nightmare getting Amazon to accept the return instead of putting me in touch with Apple. After 47 minutes on the phone (with 2 people I could barely understand), they sent a return label. I will just go to my local Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: It's an iPad but in a decent form factor.
customer_reviews.text: Normal iPads cramp up my hands after a few minutes. I have a first generation iPad Mini, but it's too old to run the current version of iOS so I don't even turn the wifi on anymore. This 5th generation iPad Mini is both new and old. The home button isn't haptic, which threw me off, but the processor and battery both exceed expectations. Reading books is comfortable on this device. Playing games is also comfortable. I'd imagine that most productivity tasks would be quite comfortable, but I use this device for entertainment. If I need to do something heavy, I use my PC with the TR2920x. For basic tasks this device is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Jarman

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but not best value. Fast but no the fastest. Productive but not the most.
customer_reviews.text: The ipad mini is a compromise of everything. It's definitely not the fastest, cheapest, or even the best ipad any task, yet it can do everything. It's good enough for playing GPU intensive games without a problem. Apple pencil support adds more productivity but it isn't the best at it compared to even the original ipad pro. And the price is low enough that most people can buy it, but it's definitely not cheap at all compared to the often on sale for $250 base ipad. It's an excellent product full of trade-offs and balanced compromises.
customer_reviews.author: changen pan

customer_reviews.title: It’s great except when it’s not.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great except when it’s not. It freezes up and loads WAY too often for an iPad. I haven’t even had it a month and I’ve never seen an apple product behave this way. I love all of its features except for the one where it doesn’t have a big enough processor for small simple apps. 😒 thinking of returning but hoping an update will fix the issue. Then I will be back to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Battery life disappointing and heat when using notability
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my 2018ipad for mini2019, the battery life is a huge disappointment for the new ipad mini, I am a student and take alot of not in class, the mini would only last half day compared to my old ipad2018 full day. iPad mini also heats alot when using notability!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elroi

customer_reviews.title: Review and validate not to send Used Items when need to ne new.
customer_reviews.text: I pay and select a new item, was a gift for my 8 years Son, and the item was USED with personal contacts and photos of the previous owner.
customer_reviews.author: ArturoZermeno

customer_reviews.title: iPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: I will update my review in a month. But so far so great! I added a picture for size comparison with my MacBook Air. I saw many reviews who claimed that the size was too small and well all I can say for my hands it’s perfect. Great travel size light and cute. I also was worried that people said it was slow and well it’s not I’ve been able to play all my rpgs, read books, write, draw, and browse at top speeds. Perfect iPad for me completely in love. If I find any issues I will update this review but for now I can say it was worth it <3
customer_reviews.author: Iridy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite IPad
customer_reviews.text: The perfect iPad for me! I originally had the iPad 6th generation but for my general reading and browsing the size was always too big for comfort especially while reading in bed. The new iPad mini hits the sweet spot in every category. The screen is bright and beautiful the new a12 chip tackles any task you throw at it and the size is perfect for any occasion. This is hands down my favorite iPad of the line and thank you amazon for the great price and always fast 2 day shipping I highly recommended this little beast!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Same old, same old
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an earlier generation one that started overheating and acting erratically. I cannot tell one iota of difference between this one and the much older model, except this one doesn’t overheat (yet). I just love this size for fitting in my purse and being lightweight. But seeing the lack of improvement between models will most likely make this the last ipad I’ll buy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Fix

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a bigger version of my phone. Bought this just so I could play games and read manga and stuff without having to use a tiny screen on my iPhone 11 Pro. I just wish the full size keyboard had the swipe to type function. I know you can download third-party keyboards but I want that on the default one. Hopefully a software update fixes it. Also, for just 64 gigs, this is way too expensive. Not sure why this thing still has giant bezels and still uses Touch ID. Headphone jack is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Supreme Overlord

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet on the market....
customer_reviews.text: I have owned an iPad mini since Apple introduced the mini. The iPad mini 4 I had till last November (2018). I had given up there was going to be an updated mini. Bought iPad 10.5, less than a month gave back, was too heavy. Bought recently Kindle Fire, good, but just wasn’t the iPad. Have had the iPad mini 5 256GB for less than 6 days and it is like having your old friend back. The Apple Pencil 1 is great. My Moshi iPad mini 4 case fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Westokie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was going to get the iPad Pro 11in but do I gotta tell you I’m happy I didn’t, I literally only use my iPad mini when I’m laying in bed, and it is so perfect for that. I can lay anyway I want and it’ll be so comfortable to hold since it’s so light. I’m assuming the iPad 11in would’ve been a bit better for consuming media but the comfort on the mini will out beat that any day of the week. I have a iPhone 11 Pro and it did kind of take some getting used to the screen since it’s not a oled. But once you get used to the screen you’ll love it. Promise 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Cameron H.

customer_reviews.title: New IPad mini5 is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just came from a Asus memoPad, probably the the slowest pad in the universe but it was free. The iPad mini 5 is fast and modern. It still has the Apple basic set up but it looks upgraded to me. It’s a pain in the neck to learn coming from Android but easy enough to navigate. This pad moves when you tap the screen and buttons it’s very fast. The larger screen has sharp crisp color and excellent definition. Still learning and will update later
customer_reviews.author: Ronald pleake

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: First, HOW AND WHY do people write reviews if they didn't purchase it off amazon? Anyway... I'm very pleased with my purchase. It's been about 6 weeks- works wonderfully, easy to set up as if I purchased it directly from Apple or my Verizon store, I mean it's exactly what you'd expect to buy. Came with everything you need in the box and the charger also worked perfectly. I opted for amazon because they had a deal $50 less than the retail. It was also delivered with care and I couldn't be happier. I got it to for travel, and to fit in my 11" x 7" purse (with keyboard case)!
customer_reviews.author: Uchiha Itachi

customer_reviews.title: Why Did I Wait?
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three of four Kindle Fires over the years and I have really never had any complaints. Well, things went wrong like being knocked offline all the time and having to reboot a few times a day but I thought that was the best I could expect. Tryin to print anything was hit or miss, mostly miss. I bought the IPad Mini with a lot of hesitation mainly because I have so many Fires that still work and the cost is so much more than a Fire. Well, I am so impressed with my new iPad. It does everything and it does it well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boleyn

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive. Apple could lower their prices. I have a fire which I really like but my phone is from apple so that’s why I bought this. I think Amazons Fire is superior to my mini iPad. Apple definitely has a monopoly
customer_reviews.author: LYNN M KINDSETH

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved my mini, but I only used it occasionally as I already have an iPhone and macbook air. I used it for meeting notes, keeping track of my small business, etc. But then a few days ago as I used it, I noticed my screen was flickering. I plugged it in to charge it and then this morning went to use it and my screen is black. If I hold the buttons it makes noises so I know it's working, but the LCD seems to have died. I just barely bought it in December (4 months ago). So that's a bummer. I'll never buy a product like this online again unless it's through Apple directly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iPad!
customer_reviews.text: Great small iPad. I have an iPad pro and an iPad mini 4. This new iPad mini is so much more than the 4 but the features are hidden. If you are new to the iPad world it doesn't matter if you get a 4 or 5. They will appear to be the same...but they aren't. You will find out after a while. Using the pencil is one of the features the 5 has that the 4 does not. The 5 is also faster than the 4. Love the way it fits in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Sisterhare

customer_reviews.title: ipad would not work
customer_reviews.text: Ipad mini would not turn on or work at all. Bad purchase, had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L Martin

customer_reviews.title: After Just two months doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product two months ago and now the product doesn't work. It has a full charge and now it is a piece of junk! I wish to return it, but I do not know how to contact the seller! I really need some help with this, it was quite expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new iPad and got a used one. No instructions, Rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Nice iPad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after having a Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 for 3-4 years. That tablet started to crash so I decided to try an iPad. Setup was awesome. Performance is so close for reading/surfing/youtube, etc. it truly surprised me. I also find it strange that there are so many apps not optimized for the iPad. Virtually all of the Android apps were sized well and looked like they should. Apple has a TON that just suck on an iPad. Facebook is sized funny, Strava is sized funny, even Amazon leaves an awkward space on the right side of the screen. A little disappointing they can't get that part right...
customer_reviews.author: Fastluck13

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, fast, clear screen
customer_reviews.text: replaced a regular-sized iPad since I was reading many kindle and newspapers its very lightweight, not sure why anyone would want the larger iPad, this is much more compact i replaced an amazon kindle paperwhite which though good battery life, etc. and simple, was a VERY expensive way to read newspapers, etc. since AMZN charges more than 2x the digital subscription rate. and the amazon kindle versions of WSJ, NYT, Economist, WA Post, etc. are only the digital equiv of the print edition, i.e. no intraday updates, and no way to share content off the device...
customer_reviews.author: RM98104

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This was a pricey impulse gift to myself... but it was worth every penny. I use it far more than I thought I ever would. Apple products are not cheap...and you weep a bit when you hand over your money. 20 minutes later you forget because you’re so happy. Don’t buy cheap Android junk tablets. Bite the bullet and buy Apple!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for an earlier model
customer_reviews.text: I use an iPad in my airplane as backup for navigation purposes. My Mini 2 was still working fine but I became worried about the inability to upgrade the operating software and the lack of speed on some programs. The 5th Gen model eliminated any concerns. It works superbly well and should be upgradable for years to come. The picture is surprising large(r), bright(er) and fast(er) than my Mini 2 (which I continue to use for less challenging activities). I can see the screen with leaning over to close the distance as I did sometimes when looking at small fonts on navigation programs on the Mini 2.
customer_reviews.author: Glastar

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented product
customer_reviews.text: The website indicated that you could use a USB drive for files, unfortunately nothing in the description indicated that the software had to be updated to iOS 13, !!! After watching the web, I found out. Shame on you for not including it in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Poet & Don't know it

customer_reviews.title: Easy choice
customer_reviews.text: It was a choice between a new iPhone, which I almost never used, and a new iPad, which I used constantly. I bought a $75 flip phone and I’m still patting myself on my back for my decision. This iPad is so unbelievably fast that it is wonderful. What used to takes minutes, many, many minutes, for iPad 2 to download a book takes a couple of seconds. Safari doesn’t crash every time I try to read an article. Best decision I could’ve made.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Sobo

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased with Cellular
customer_reviews.text: This is a REAL review. I never review products before using them for a substantial amount of time. Deducted 1 star for no cellular. My fault for not purchasing with cellular. But I watched a dozen or more review videos online. Only one recommended getting cellular. THEY WERE WRONG! Consider your own usage carefully!. Besides that the device is a very nice size with good features and a great display. Control buttons are in the traditional place but on this size tablet should have been redesigned. Cumbersome. Sound is mediocre. Decent value for the money but not sure a different type of devise would do the same job for less.
customer_reviews.author: Docsarvis

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, Not too small, Its Just The Right Size.
customer_reviews.text: The Ipad mini is the perfect size to carry around. Its small enough to easily fit into a bag or backpack but large enough to use for reading ebooks and of course surfing the web I prefer a large screen for movies but recently I was traveling in Italy where few stations were available in English, I was able to get Netflix and a few other websites in English and the smaller screen was fine. The color rendition is accurate and bright and it was very easy to set up. I still use my larger Ipad at home but this is now my go to device everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the new one that said “package damaged” because the user manual was missing. Upon arrival, nothing was damaged or missing! And I saved some $$! Super excited and love my mini over the original iPad 4 I had.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: This is an alright iPad mini for 2019. It had like a dent in the corner. Was hoping it would be almost par to the newer iPhone but it is like way behide on specs and materials.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Small tablet but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself as Mother’s Day gift this year and it has been amazing! I know the iPad Pro is not buttonless, but I actually loved that this still has the home button, I’m still not convinced of the facial recognition dealio. This tablet is super fast and it comes with all the bells and whistles of it being a high end tablet even for a small size, and even though I love my Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 8.0, I needed another small tablet for portability especially because my old tablet no longer has updates. This tablet is light, easy and comfortable to hold and great for productivity and media consumption.
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent eBook Reader
customer_reviews.text: I don't game on my iPad so I'll review it mainly for its eBook reading experience. The iPad Mini makes an excellent eBook reader compared to the regular iPad. I can hold it in one hand and that makes the reading experience much more enjoyable. 64GB is plenty of space for eBooks. I'd recommend getting a nice case to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Polished to near-perfection
customer_reviews.text: It handles just like my pixel 4a. The swipe gestures are more like pixel than an iPhone SE 2020. The quality-of-life features are excellent. All apps I’ve tested run better here than even the Fire HD 10. Black levels can still be improved though. I have yet to try a premium android tablet. Video apps like Amazon Prime Video and Disney plus also allow for portrait viewing. Speakers are plenty loud when compared to fire tablets. Overall, a better media consumption device than its competitors. The extra power eats through the battery a bit faster, though. Could use a bit more storage, either built-in and/or expandable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fastest iPad besides the newest 2018 iPad pro.
customer_reviews.text: Good iPad for the person who wants to read some ebooks or watch YouTube before bedtime. FYI the a12 CPU chip in this iPad is what makes it cost so much more than the larger and cheaper standard 2018 iPad. If you're not good with technical stuff, I'll keep it short: the iPad is VERY fast for multitasking, editing, gaming, or anything you could possibly want from it. And it should be powerful enough to still keep up years from now so you're getting a good investment on the device.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: School work is easy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for school and it does what I need it to do and way more! Totally glad I ended up getting this instead of a bulky laptop (space was the biggest factor as I do not have a lot of it) It was also more portable imo. It can run all of my school programs and connect to a wireless keyboard so that I can get assignments done, type up my notes, etc. Eventually I'll get a laptop when I have the space but this is a wonderful alternative for the time being and I genuinely couldn't be happier with it! I havent drawn on it yet but I do plan too!
customer_reviews.author: BriAnna

customer_reviews.title: Apple reigns supreme in the tablet wars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the excellent Apple iPad Mini 5 even though I'm an Android guy. It is THE BEST small tablet available. No other tablet can touch it. The screen resolution is superb, and ease of use, battery life, connectivity has no equal.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: An ipad's an ipad
customer_reviews.text: I mean, the price differnce between this and the apple store is non existant. If you ahve the option jut buy it there for the warranty
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: It's a tiny iPad
customer_reviews.text: Terrific battery life. Just about perfect for my use (email, Citrix Receiver applications, web browsing and conference-ralated apps). Use either in a ZAGG Folio keyboard case or uncased and hand held. The Sparin tempered glass screen protector is a great addition. Controls on the small screen might be a bit tight for those with fat fingers. This is a bigger problem dealing with Windows applications in Citrix. Native on-screen keyboards can be a pain, thus my recommendation for a keyboard case if doing anything more than casual typing.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: A must have item
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for My iPad mini3. I love the mini size. Fits in my purse easily. I used to travel with several paperback books, a camera, and cellphone. The iPad has all of those features and more. I can even watch movies. The weight and size make it easy to hold while reading, playing games for long periods of time. What’s nice is I can take a photo of a online recipe, follow the recipe in photos, while listening to my music on my iPad. Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: HighlandgirlDeb

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for Apple!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using Android for years. Finally took action to try Apple. I LOVE it! There were a few things I had to search Google to learn, but otherwise very easy to switch and apps menus are very user friendly. I doubt if I'll go back to Android...
customer_reviews.author: ChersGroupie

customer_reviews.title: Great little mini
customer_reviews.text: This is the iPad mini 5th generation. It is faster than my older iPad mini 2. Letters, colors and photographs looks so vibrant. It was quite easy transferring my data to this ipad. The 64gb is plenty for me. It is lighter and slightly thinner than my older iPad. Very pleased with my purchase and I saved $50 off of the retail price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything I have had!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay 1 month in. Replaced a 1 year old Ipad Mini 4 that was great, gave to friend. This is better! Better battery - way better than the other. Sound quality wow! I am shocked - movie theater experience! Fills the space with art. Camera on the front crystal clear. Speed is insane! A12 - they did not skimp. Should be good for 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ladwig

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Much better (and more expensive) than a Kindle fire but for me worth the extra money. The display is crisp and readable at even low illumination. A pleasure for these old eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Ipad When You’re on the Road!
customer_reviews.text: I love the iPad Mini 5. It’s the ideal way to consume online content, shop, and communicate on the go. It’s larger than my iPhone 7s, smaller than my iPad 10.5” tablet I keep at home. I bought the WiFi only version as I can use my iPhone as a wireless connection, so no additional phone line required. Works great! 5 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly , very nice feature set compared to first generation mini iPad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mini iPad to replace a first generation iPad mini that worked perfectly except that we use it to run Circuit Design studio. Design studio would not run on the version of OS the original iPad mini has installed after the latest Circut update. Seems the original iPad mini will not update to OS12. The migration over to this iPad mini was fast and painless, we have the ability to run the Circut design studio again ... All is good!
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: screen cover already on  on a new ipad mini 5 which means it is used
customer_reviews.text: I discovered after going to best buy for the geek squad to place new screen cover that there is some screen cover on; checked with apple online and apple store that new ipad mini 5 does not come with screen cover!!
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Ipad mini
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my mini 3 version. Not much difference other than the speed. Version 5 still has the weak wifi strength as the version 3. Only downfall on Apples part. Still a great tablet. But still a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic device. When apple announced the new iPad mini refresh, I was excited as its my favorite iPad form factor. This is a little powerhouse. Well worth the money. Upgraded from an iPad mini 2.
customer_reviews.author: K. McNamara

customer_reviews.title: It's an iPad, what more is there to say?  Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using iPads since the original Ipad mini with retina display. The only reason I finally upgraded to the current "new" iPad mini, was because the iPad Mini 2 that I was using is now no longer supported by Apple. The iPad itself still works great. That alone should speak to the quality of the tablets. Apple makes a quality product and at this point in time, I will buy no other brand. I've tried cheaper, Android-based alternatives, and there really is no comparison. Spend a few extra dollars and get a tablet that will last for years, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff DeVergilio

customer_reviews.title: It’s Apple! Totally rocks👍
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to pony up the money for a nice iPad! I love the mini Easy to transport and I also use it for a screen for my drone!
customer_reviews.author: M J R

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my new mini 5. I still have the mini 2 version. I keep that in the kitchen now for watching news, looking up recipes. These minis are little workhorses and the mini 5 is so so fast. Lots of memory, lightning fast bringing up programs and beautiful graphics. I play Civilization 6 on it and the graphics are incredible.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: This review is oy for this particular ipad mini. Came new, box was in plastic as a normal new item does and was not a refurbished item..at least not ordered as such. Opened,all was in order and began setup and once I reached the touch id page it froze and wouldnt let me go further. It also kicked on the voice over and would not allow me to shut down, the voiceover would announce every button and move I attempted without response. So, returning CS was good
customer_reviews.author: Thurnell S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for reading
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the mini as it is perfect for reading, and the Apple Pencil support is an extra plus. Great for taking notes and reading pdf documents.
customer_reviews.author: Creationofadam

customer_reviews.title: Small fast iPad mini
customer_reviews.text: This was the smallest, fastest model in the iPad mini range. As expected, it feels fast and easy to use! The iPad mini cover from the original iPad mini does not fit it so we had to order a new cover. We tested all the features that we wanted to use. Mostly, it works very well. Indoor night-time photos and movies were darker and noisier than those taken at the same time and place with my iPhone X.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to upgrade from an old iPad 2 that I have had for years. Setting up the new iPad mini was an absolute breeze to do. So easy! I love the new features and the higher GB, the clarity is perfect. I am so happy with my decision to buy the mini. I am sure other larger iPads are great, but I wanted something a bit smaller and lighter. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Finds

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I was thinking of buying this tablet since it's an apple tablet and we weren't buying it at the apple store. We have 2 kids and we needed another apple tablet for one of my kids. We looked at the apple store for new tablets but there prices weren't the best. When I started looking at tablets on Amazon I didn't know what to expect since reviews are always all over the place but we are very happy with our purchase. The tablet works great and it came in the original box and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: I love my new iPad mini 5
customer_reviews.text: So, I finally bit the bullet and decided to try out the iPad mini and I am so impressed. The screen quality is exceptional and I love the gestures and multitasking features. It is everything that I did not know I needed. Plus the mini fits perfectly inside my Louis Vuitton Etui Voyage PM and in my smaller bags. I should have gotten one of these sooner but over all I am very satisfied with my purchase. I am even thinking about investing in the 10.2 iPad to replace the Fire 10 HD tablet I own. Decisions, decisions, decisions.......
customer_reviews.author: Daneen A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my iPhone 8 but have always used Kindle ereaders or Fires for tablets. My current Fire is about 6 years old and just too slow. It didn’t seem like the new ones were much faster. So I splurged on this iPad and it is perfect. It’s so fast with excellent battery life, even better than my iPhone. I can see websites in desk top modes. I’m glad I got the mini, it’s big enough for everything I need to see but small enough to fit in bags. I love Amazon for almost everything but I love Apple electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Grrrrrrll

customer_reviews.title: Traded iPad Pro 10.5 for the iPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: I love this iPad mini size! Side note: Apple please make more iPads and iPad pro in this size.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolatecakes

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have always found Apple products to be of the highest quality, but you do pay for it. I bought this to replace an eight or nine-year-old iPad, that could not be updated to the latest operating system. We just use it to connect Pandora to our wireless sound system in our house. It should do the trick for another eight or nine years.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis of CA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and very satisfied with the fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update my older iPad Mini. This was a great price for a current version device. Quality of the product mixed with the quick delivery made the whole process of this purchase very satisfying. Product was new and in the manufacturer packaging. No damage and working perfectly. Highly recommend this seller and this product. Will definitely purchase from them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sills

customer_reviews.title: Little Beast
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this little beast. It does what it claims and more. The mini 5 is the better by then the current generation iPad air. Super portable and powerful enough to complete all of my tasks. Also bought the apple pencil and it's good.
customer_reviews.author: The Ward Family

customer_reviews.title: Little iPad won this Android girl over.
customer_reviews.text: I've been an Android girl for a long, long time. I recently purchased a Android tablet, but I really wasn't happy with it. So I decided to give this little iPad a try. I'm blown away with how much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carey W

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not as stated in description
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is definitely ten hours as described in description. I get maybe three or four while using it. It is less than my iPad mini 4. I am disappointed because I would of just gotten the iPad mini 4 again for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ it.
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly to fly my DJI Mavic 2 Zoom Drone. It fits right into the controller. But at night in bed the little mini is my mini-me. Lol. Apple wins again. But their cheap as hell. They change to a c-usb plug on their new phones and iPads and then they sell their AirPod pros for $250 and it doesn’t even come with a charging block. You only get the cable. Come on Apple cut us some slack you cheap bastards.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Mister Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Good in betweener
customer_reviews.text: Like the size, speed weight and clarity. I have the iPhone X, and IPP 12.9. The IPP 12.9 sometimes gets awkward to hold comfortably when using in bed. The phone obviously is too small for long use at home. This is a good in between device.
customer_reviews.author: Steve from Socal

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Received my iPad mini for my birthday. This is by far the best tablet I have ever owned. It was fast delivery, it is excellent quality and worth every penny. When I say worth every penny it wasn’t even expensive at all. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: justy210

customer_reviews.title: Longer Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I have this product for a month now and I can't believe that its battery life is up to 10 hours and more. I can use it to do my presentation and it gives me the assurance that it can hold for a lot of hours to come.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLa

customer_reviews.title: Fifth times the charm!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th iPad and 3rd iPad mini. I am obsessed. This time, I went all hog and got the cellular option. I like that it is so small and so powerful. I can fit it in my scrub pocket to refer to as needed. I keep getting the mini to upgrade and for larger capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Aphasialady

customer_reviews.title: My first iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Lite weight and easy to carry. I have loaded in some of the books that I wanted. I do like the features, even though I will not use them all. It is a helpful took and I use it every day. The cover is well made and staays attached which position I use it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size. Not too big, not too little, just right.
customer_reviews.text: The size is absolutely perfect for note taking, small enough to carry around in your hand around work, still a good size to watch youtube videos with. Good battery life. Still has a home button.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim to treat myself for my b-day despite having a full sized iPad. I didnt know if I would get use out of both but I do. I LOVE the smaller size for most tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Saffire

customer_reviews.title: YouTube videos ALWAYS buffering
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's birthday. He is reporting that YouTube videos are buffering. He hasn't been able to watch a complete video without the issue. All our other wifi devices have no issues with YouTube video ( Roku, Chromebooks, cellular phones, etc.). Changing settings has not resolved the issue ( DNS server, cache, resolution, etc.) The speed test is reporting 70+ Mbps for both upload and download. Perhaps I got a dud?
customer_reviews.author: Lifetime Learner

customer_reviews.title: iPad Mini 5
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, paired with our iPhone easily, all apps transferred with ease, all photos are there. It is small, carries without any trouble, and there are many accessories for it. The case is slippery and grip isn't a good as I thought. I ordered a small case to remedy the slippery issue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: All around good device,
customer_reviews.text: It’s a delight to use. I had the kindle fire HD 8, but there were hardly any good apps, slow as molasses, and still charged over micro USB. The iPad mini is super fast, tons of apps, and guaranteed updates for at least 3+more years. The size is amazing for reading, and surfing the web. Plus it uses the same charger as my phone, and that’s actually pretty important for me. The less cables for me to travel with, the better.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for Ipad mini 3
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a mini 3 which just recently stopped getting updates. The mini 5 is light, fast and works well and was a worthy upgrade. One issue was messing around trying to take a night video as the screen was black and stayed that way even though there was lightning going off that my Iphone can capture just fine. Good thing I almost never use the tablet camera for other than a few still photos and then it does and adequate job.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: My second iPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: This iPad replaced my 6 year old mini which still worked well, but I wanted the increased speed, storage and picture quality that this iPad Mini offers. I prefer the Mini for its compact size which allows me to very easily toss into my carry-on bag while traveling by air, or into my motorcycle saddlebag while out enjoying a wind therapy session. Sits in my hands like a good book when placing my recliner in tilt mode too. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cruizer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice 'Senior Friendly' mid size iPad
customer_reviews.text: This iPad mini is great. it is not like the bigger bulkier ones so it is easier to hold for older people or someone with not so good hand strength to hold for a long period. The size is good, easy to see, no squinting. Good for people with "not as good as it used to be" vision.
customer_reviews.author: rick parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great for art.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very lightweight and easy to take with me on trips. I use it for digital painting and sculpting.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: IPad Mini.
customer_reviews.text: This IPad came brand new with all original packaging still in plastic. It was just the same getting any other new unlocked iPad and was easy to set up. If charged properly the battery will stay at over 20 percent for over 24 hours. It stays connected to WiFi and stays connected to a VPN. 100% recommend buying an IPad mini from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Parker

customer_reviews.title: I Wish I Had One!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's birthday. She absolutely loves it and never lets go of it. To me it's an incredible piece of equipment. Everything just works and I love not having to tinker with everything, The graphics are fantastic and never any trouble with performance. I do the updates and would love to have one. Unfortunately I inherited her old Android Acer tablet tinker toy. Maybe someday it will blow up and I'll get my own.
customer_reviews.author: Vat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Excellent Display
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for reading and watching videos. It even fits in gym short/sweatpants (ie. pandemic work attire) pockets! Great for reading without feeling like you're doing bicep curls.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Walker

customer_reviews.title: Mini is legit
customer_reviews.text: I had an iPad Air but sent it back because it was just too big. The mini fits perfectly in my hands for playing games and browsing the web.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jewell

customer_reviews.title: I’m a rookie in training
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Apple product. I had to try it esp since hearing they are more secure. I hope that is true. So far the experience has been a good one. Adjusting has been somewhat less painful than expected, but I am still learning. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Almost five stars: One Complaint-battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. WAAAAAY better than Samsung Tab (I mean night and day). It is responsive, fast, perfect size. I've read complaints that the look is "dated", but you need the space on the bottom and top for you fingers, so you don't touch the screen while holding it. Is it expensive? Yes. Is it worth the price? absolutely. It's the best tablet on the market, hands down!!!
customer_reviews.author: CDBeauty NYC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Apple product and I am very pleased with it so far. I always wanted a tablet that was fast, good screen quality, and good sound, and quick updates. So far this one has not dissapointed yet, but as I just got it I will see how well it works against my Huawei tablet and kindle fire. If I keep having great experiances with it I will donate them to my grandkids. So we will see.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Charger
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is good but the charger is broke doesn’t change at all I was trying to contact amazon but they didn’t call me back. I bought the iPad as a gift for my son. Therefore I noticed last week the the charger wasn’t working but I did not want to return the hall package because my son will be very sad if I return.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: It’s an Apple
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always bought Apple tablets. Have always had a great experience with them. I used my last one till they stopped providing updated software. Naturally I decided to stay with Apple. Only complaint I have is That the battery doesn’t last as long as my older tablet. That may do to the fact that this new version seems to have more features running in the background. But overall I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Katzzz

customer_reviews.title: Must buy LTE version!
customer_reviews.text: With LTE connectivity, iPad mini can be perfect. You can use any where. Watch movie, youtube, check email, memo, online chat, any where without border.
customer_reviews.author: Youn Sung

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy about buying this iPad mini on amazon. But I’m so glad I did! I bought this for my birthday in February so I’ve had it for some months now. Still works great! Good battery life. Light weight. I haven’t had any issues with it so far! It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Linda V.

customer_reviews.title: These might be on Sale for a Reason - defective charge ports
customer_reviews.text: The unit we received had a charge port that would only charge after plugging in and out 3-5 times. Brand new, brand new apple charger and cable and charging was not working well. We called Apple Care...they didn't help much. It's a defective unit and so there's some QA issues here. Ended up purchasing at Best Buy for the full retail (50 dollars more) and to be able to return it quicker if it's yet another dud. Beware. Personally I've had alot of issues with these small tablets like Microsoft Surface Go where I ended up giving up on and returning. This ipad is for my gf and she needs it so we are giving it another shot.
customer_reviews.author: M. Romero

customer_reviews.title: So happy with new IPad
customer_reviews.text: Love. It. !!! Having never owned an Apple product, I was a little leery about getting an IPad. I was an avid Kindle lover, but having lost it, I decided to take the plunge and get an IPad. I’m so happy I did. It’s easy to use, has everything on it you could possibly want. I wished I bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Best for mobile gaming
customer_reviews.text: Fast and beautiful. Terrible value considering the $150 premium for what amounts to a $25 SD card but that's the apple tax for ya.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really impressed. This is my first iPad and I wanted something compact. It does everything I want it to do and I’m really happy with it so far. Makes me wish I had gotten one sooner. I think the battery is ok but I hold reservations because I know some Apple products deteriorate fast. But right now I’m satisfied. If you’re on the fence it’s Definitely worth getting and trying this out.
customer_reviews.author: HRJR

product_meta.title: Apple iPad Mini (Wi-Fi, 64GB) - Space Gray (Latest Model)
feature_bullets: 7.9-inch Retina Display with True Tone and wide Color
8MP back camera, 7MP FaceTime HD front camera
802.11ac Wi-Fi and Gigabit-class LTE cellular data
Up to 10 hours of battery life
Lightning connector for charging and accessories
iOS with group FaceTime, shared augmented reality experiences, screen time, and more
